attributes.action: Be Aware Of Projected State Pension Changes for 2015 / 2016
attributes.additional_details: I am asking the DWP to please consider those of us who will be the losers in these new proposals.  Due to the fact you have now moved the date from 2015 to 2016 we are asking to be allowed to defer our state pension so that we may benefit from this new scheme, having paid National insurance all our working lives.
